content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
### Resource Depot & Smelting Facility at base position (x=-4.5, y=18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-4.5, y=18.5) serving as the central storage depot.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-3.0, y=19.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-4.0, y=21.0) used for processing copper ore into copper plates.

### Automation Lab & Steam Power System (Integrated System)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (x=-7.5, y=18.5) used for automation research (lab input includes automation science packs).
- Boiler at position (x=-5.5, y=24.0) with its steam output at (x=-5.5, y=22.5) used for generating steam (Status: NO_FUEL; Warning: "out of fuel").
- Steam Engine (Generator) at position (x=-0.5, y=24.5) used to convert steam into electrical power (Status: NOT_CONNECTED; Warnings: "not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections").
- Offshore Pump at position (x=-7.5, y=25.5) supplying water to the system.
- Electricity Group (id=191) with supporting poles at positions:
   • (x=-8.5, y=21.5)
   • (x=-2.5, y=24.5)
   • (x=-7.5, y=15.5)
  for power distribution.
- Pipe Groups forming the fluid network:
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=744) at position (x=-10.5, y=16.5) [Status: EMPTY].
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=745) at position (x=-12.5, y=18.5) [Status: EMPTY].
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=747) at position (x=-8.5, y=20.5) carrying water [Status: FULL_OUTPUT].
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=749) at position (x=-2.5, y=21.5) [Status: EMPTY] established for connecting the Boiler with the Steam Engine.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────
- Entity Placement and Reference Issues:
  • Ensure the target location for placing an entity is buildable, unoccupied, and validated by can_place_entity checks.
  • Verify that all entity reference variables (such as the undefined “steam_engine_adjacent”) are properly initialized before use.

- Piping and Connection Issues:
  • Confirm that all connection points between structures (e.g. between the Boiler’s steam output and the Steam Engine) are correctly aligned and unobstructed.
  • Check that sufficient pipe inventory is available to meet the connection requirements.

- Inventory and Crafting Dependencies:
  • Verify that required items (for instance, the steam engine or automation science packs) are present in inventory before placement or insertion.
  • Ensure all necessary crafting dependencies and sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheel and iron-plate) can be produced with available smelting or crafting facilities.

- Buildable Area and Property Access:
  • Access properties correctly without invoking non-callable objects, and perform buildable area checks accurately to avoid placement errors.
